mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_REGDATE , NOTICE_DIVISION FROM CAP_DELIVERY_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{ntc_No}
